mapper.select: select resume_no from career where career_company != '신입' group by resume_no having sum(career_year)>=#{career_year}

select r.resume_no, user_name, (select final_edu||'('||uni||')' from education where resume_no=#{resume_no}) final_edu, (select sum(career_year) from career where resume_no=#{resume_no}) career_year, self_int_title, sal, jobtype1, jobtype2, location1, location2 from resume r join member m on r.resume_no = m.resume_no where r.resume_no = #{resume_no}
